00002  *  maven Programming Language

00006 #include "maven.h"
00007 #include "struct_StringList.h"
00008 #include "struct_MavenCompiler.h"
00009 #include "strings.h"
00010 #include "errors.h"
00011 #include "namespaces.h"
00012 #include "constants.h"
00013 #include "enums.h"
00014 #include "variables.h"
00015 
00016 string findMavenEnumPath(MavenCompiler* c, string entity) {
00017         StringList items = split('.', trim(entity));
00018         int namespaceID, objectID;
00019         
00020         // we take off the array brackets [] and then add them on at the end
00021         string array = entity.substr(stripRawType(entity).length(), 10);
00022         entity = entity.substr(0, stripRawType(entity).length());
00023         
00024         if(isDataType(entity))
00025                 return entity + array;
00026         
00027         if(items.length() == 1) {
00028                 // if there is no namespace specified we will have to look for it
00029                 // and recognise ambiguous objects
00030                 vector<int> found;
00031                 string a = stripRawType(items[0]);
00032                 for(namespaceID = 0; namespaceID < c->namespaces->length(); ++namespaceID) {
00033                         objectID = findEnumID(c, namespaceID, a);
00034                         if(objectID >= 0) found.push_back(namespaceID);
00035                 }
00036                 --namespaceID;
00037                 
00038                 if(found.size() == 0) return MAVEN_INVALID;
00039                 else if(found.size() == 1) {
00040                         return c->namespaces->at(found[0]).name + "." + a + array;
00041                 } else pushError(c, "Ambiguous class '%s'", a);
00042         } else if(items.length() == 2) {
00043                 namespaceID = findNamespaceID(c, items[0]);
00044                 if(namespaceID < 0) return MAVEN_INVALID;
00045                 objectID = findEnumID(c, namespaceID, items[1]);
00046                 if(objectID < 0) return MAVEN_INVALID;
00047                 return items[0] + "." + items[1] + array;
00048         }
00049         
00050         return MAVEN_INVALID;
00051 }
